name: Athal Pudding
description:
Athal Pudding - The Pudding Finder

Athal Pudding is a first person funny shooter game. In this game you want to collect puddings. Boxes are falling from sky and those have puddings randomly. You need to follow that boxes for collect puddings. While you collecting pudding enemies are spawning and try to attack to you.You need to collect 10 pudding for win the game.

Available for Mac & Windows

Hope and enjoy !
